mapper.select: SELECT p.*,d.drugcode,d.drugname,d.inbulksellprice,d.dosageunit,d.ismedicare,d.norms,a1.detailname AS drugtypename, d.inbulksellprice * p.medicineamount AS drugsum,a2.detailname AS medicineformname, a3.detailenname AS medicinefrequencyname FROM prescriptiondetail p LEFT JOIN drug d ON d.id = p.drugid LEFT JOIN attributedetail a1 ON a1.id = d.drugtypeid LEFT JOIN attributedetail a3 ON a3.id = p.medicinefrequencyid LEFT JOIN attributedetail a2 ON a2.id = p.medicineformid WHERE p.isvalid = 1 AND prescriptionid = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT p.*,d.drugcode,d.drugname,d.inbulksellprice,d.dosageunit,d.ismedicare,a1.detailname AS drugtypename, d.inbulksellprice * p.medicineamount AS drugsum,a2.detailname AS medicineformname, a3.detailenname AS medicinefrequencyname FROM prescriptiondetail p LEFT JOIN drug d ON d.id = p.drugid LEFT JOIN attributedetail a1 ON a1.id = d.drugtypeid LEFT JOIN attributedetail a3 ON a3.id = p.medicinefrequencyid LEFT JOIN attributedetail a2 ON a2.id = p.medicineformid WHERE p.isvalid = 1 AND a1.detailname != '西药' AND prescriptionid = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
